name: CHUBB
0:
”Alexa, Open Chubb”
”Alexa, Ask Chubb when my next bill is due”
”Alexa, Ask Chubb about my claims”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chubb
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Already have a Chubb online account? Meet the newest way for you to connect with Chubb and get information quickly. The Chubb Alexa skill can help get Billing, Claims and Policy coverage information – all by just using your voice. To link your Chubb account, simply follow the prompts when enabling the skill in your Alexa mobile app or website.

Just say “Alexa, open Chubb.”, and ask questions like: 

When is my next bill due?
Is my Inspection Report ready?
What is my agent's phone number?
